partner.title: Our partners
partner.trust: They decided to trust us and affiliate with us.

about.title: About
about.desc_line1: Located in the cities of Yaoundé and Douala, the DSM Aviation Regional Institute is a private training center created by the DSM group with the aim of offering training in certain areas of civil aviation. These trainings were granted by the CCAA which deemed the school suitable and sufficiently equipped to supervise in these areas (See Training). The school is based on three pillars which represent its motto here, namely: Rigor - Professionalism - Excellence.

service.title: Our Services
service.service01_desc: Identification of prospects / customers interested in a product, Implementation in order to understand these preferences in order to be able to convert them and retain them.
service.service02_desc: Conglomerate of traders and service providers.
service.service03_desc: Order management, Sales follow-up, Communication, Marketing
service.promotion: Take advantage of our extensive sales network
service.promotion_explain: Increase your profits by members of the AFRIZON network.

contact.title: Contact
contact.desc: Ideas, recommendations, observations, complaints, etc.? Please leave us a message with as much detail as possible.

home.a_d: IRDSM AVIATION is a private training center with the aim of offering training in certain fields of civil aviation. These trainings are accredited by the CCAA and also by IATA.
home.skill_d: Quality training, internships and job coaching
home.p01_desc: Composed mainly of aviation expert, IRDSM-AVIATION guarantees you quality training that meets the expectations of the employment sector.
home.p02_desc: Through various partnerships IRDSM-AVIATION guarantees you training courses in companies in order to better apply your knowledge acquired during the training.
home.p03_desc: Every day, IRDSM-AVIATION fights hard to make it easier for each learner at the end of their training to find work in the chosen sector.

formation.title: Training
formation.ato_desc: Responsible for the preparation, the planning of flights, the handling of passengers and freight, the ground handling and the  planning of crews ... The job of Technical Operations Agent (ATE) is rich in interest and has many facets.
formation.md_desc: Designs and implements in the company procedures and safety rules relating to the handling and transport of dangerous goods.
formation.ha_desc: Air hostess or flight attendant greet passengers on board the aircraft before ensuring the safety and smooth running of the flight. In the cabin, they serve passengers, inform them and ensure their comfort and safety.
formation.frêt_desc: The air cargo agent processes cargo on behalf of customers or an airline, within an airport. He advises the customer who wishes to transport goods, sets up a transport service, takes care of customs formalities and follows the delivery.
formation.aie_desc: Administer, and manage the logistics management of an order in order to support the activity of the company.
formation.cc_desc: Development of the load plan, balance, aircraft and loading messages
formation.sc_desc: Supervision of the realization of the physical loading, the exploitation of the cargo plan of an aircraft
formation.aga_desc: Plan the loading and unloading according to the specific mass and centering characteristics of the flight. He draws up the documents for the captain and the flight record. He is also responsible for supervising the various stakeholders of the platform, the embarkation and disembarkation of passengers, refueling, catering, and all the services essential to the departure of the plane.
formation.ae_desc: The airport ground handling agent is part of the commercial services of an airline. He works at the passenger reception desks of an airport, where he takes care of departing (boarding), arriving (disembarking) or connecting (transit) customers.
formation.apa_desc: The airport runway officer is responsible for all runway operations. As soon as a plane lands, he / she takes action and guides him in his maneuvers on the ground. He / she parks it, places the chocks, loads and unloads the luggage.
formation.ma_desc: The aeronautical warehouse operator provides support in the trades: receiving, distributing, shipping and liaising with his logistics support.
formation.mta_desc: The aeronautical handler is responsible for the use of aircraft protection and fixing equipment, and ensures the safety of personnel and equipment in the aircraft traffic area.
formation.aea_desc: Between flights, he must perform a thorough cleaning of the interior of the aircraft and a quick cleaning during a stopover. He checks that nothing is missing (cleaning products, etc.) and replenishes if necessary.
formation.pd_desc: In civilian life, drone pilots can work in many fields of activity: construction, town planning, agriculture, environment, engineering, photography, audiovisual, surveillance, etc.
